author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Brooks Bicentennial, Back in Time
text:
Brooks Bicentennial, Back in Time Oct 14, 2015 
Brooks — Back in Time, a series of informal talks and recollections by town elders, is planned throughout 2016 as part of the bicentennial celebration of Brooks. 
To jump start the series, three wise “old-timers” — Don Nickerson, Arthur Humphrey and Steve Hall — will share their stories about farming Friday, Oct. 23, at 6:30 p.m. at the Varney Memorial Building, 24 Veterans Highway/Route 7. 
The trio’s rich narrations of the past are sure to interest, delight and educate all who attend. The event is free and open to all. 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
